name: Probability PLC
tag_list: mobile, gambling, lottery, slots, casino, bingo, iphone, android, ios, ipad, wagering, betting, london, uk
overview:
Probability is a leading technology provider to the mobile entertainment gambling industry in regulated markets. We offer a B2B white label solution to provide access to our network via ‘Probability Managed’ and ‘Partner Managed’ services, and B2C ‘Own Brand’ solutions via LadyLucks and Moobile Games. The business was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in London, UK with subsidiaries in Gibraltar and Switzerland.

Gambling services are operated by Probability (Gibraltar) Ltd. a wholly owned subsidiary of Probability PLC, which holds a remote gambling licence from the Government of Gibraltar. Probability Games Corporation Ltd. is licenced by the UK Gambling Commission. Probability PLC floated on the London Stock Exchange in 2006 and is listed as PBTY. Probability entered into the Italian mobile gambling market in 2012, when it acquired the B2B provider Playyoo SA.

Current clients include Rank Group, 888, William Hill, Paddy Power and more.

www.probability.co.uk

milestones.description: Award of gambling licence in Gibraltar.
Launch of "Touch Casino" product for iOS and Android devices
